tweet: Cardano Foundation, in partnership with FP Complete, have extended the audits activities to include dedicated reports into Haskell libraries! The second dependency report has been published which is on the cborg package:  https://t.co/zJbdyAXZF1

Quantum computers can threaten the security of networks and services that depend on public key encryption. Distributed Futures research programme, sponsored by Cardano Foundation looks at how real this threat is and how/when we should start preparing:  https://t.co/ZMHpGKtGnA
